code: import BlogActionTypes from'./blog.types';export var toggleBlogHidden=function toggleBlogHidden(){return{type:BlogActionTypes.TOGGLE_BLOG_HIDDEN};};export var addBlog=function addBlog(blog){return{type:BlogActionTypes.ADD_BLOG,payload:blog};};export var removeBlog=function removeBlog(blog){return{type:BlogActionTypes.REMOVE_BLOG,payload:blog};};export var clearItemFromBlog=function clearItemFromBlog(blog){return{type:BlogActionTypes.CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_BLOG,payload:blog};};
